item.title: Labyrinth of Touhou Tri -The Dreaming Girls & The Mysterious Orbs-
item.description:
Title: Labyrinth of Touhou Tri -The Dreaming Girls & The Mysterious Orbs-
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: Nise-Eikoku Studio
Publisher: Nise-Eikoku Studio
Release Date: Jan 28, 2026




About This Game

  • A Fanmade Touhou Project DRPG With Not-So-Easy Boss Fights!
    The girls of Gensokyo weave together a dungeon RPG with an estimated playtime of 30~50 hours.
    Pick a frontline of 4 and a rear of 8 to form a party of 12 characters out of a pool over 40+ and conquer extensive dungeons!


  • The True Thrill of DRPGs – Hacking, Slashing, and Character Growth!
    Among the enemies wandering dungeons, you'll find especially troublesome (and tasty!) Rare Enemies that give much more EXP,
    Giant Enemies that are several times as stronger than regular ones and tens of times more rewarding,
    and Special Enemies that possess various unique aspects to their fights and hold special item drops!
    Raise and lower the spawn rate of various enemies, waiting in ambush for some and running from others as you explore vast dungeons!
    Find the perfect hunting ground for your party and go farming for a while!
    Use various means to devise certain, consistent strategies for powerful foes and grind, grind, grind to grow stronger!


  • Builds and Counter-Builds Are the Key to Beating Bosses!
    "They'll do this thing every X turns!" "They'll always use this attack at X% HP!" "They have a 1500% party-wide nuke!"
    "They stop time and attack 4 times for 500% damage each!" "They buff every turn with no cap!"
    The bosses blocking your way may be powerful, but there's always a solution!
    Defeat countless powerful foes with special traits by ascertaining their patterns and weaknesses,
    then going at them with a well-trained party and a finely-honed battle plan!


  • Utilize Boss Refights to Use Bosses to Farm and Challenge Even Fiercer Battles!
    By progressing through the game, you'll unlock the ability to refight bosses to your heart's content!
    You can either treat them as tasty sitting ducks to farm them and get their drops,
    or you can subject yourself to level restrictions to gain extra rewards from battling them!
    There are even some powerful special rewards you can only obtain by beating bosses with restrictions attached!
    Boss fights make for really intense battles with restrictions on, so be ready before you attempt them!


  • Skill Trees With Over 1000 Skills For Designing Your Own Synergies!
    Everyone loves Skill Trees! Each of the 40+ characters has their own massive tree exclusive to them!
    Which of the many girls will you choose? Which skills will you teach them? Who will battle in tandem with who?
    Form your own unique party and devise your own unique battle strategy!

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

This game utilizes AI for the creation, editing, and upscaling of some graphics such as backgrounds and icons.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: Core i3 8100 or Equivalent
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Processor: Core i3 12100 or Equivalent
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM

item.title: Bogos Binted?
item.description:
Title: Bogos Binted?
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: underbadger
Publisher: GameDev.ist , underbadger
Release Date: Jan 28, 2026
Early Access Release Date: Jul 24, 2025




About This Game

Welcome to a sinful night with the galaxy’s craziest aliens! Not every alien visits Earth to witness the indomitable human spirit. Some just want to chill on the Moon's surface and play games. But of course, these aren’t normal games. Alien humor is... how should we put it... a bit off.

In this first-person, four-player, online multiplayer space adventure, every alien at the table must do whatever it takes to win in a variety of tabletop games. You’ll craft sneaky strategies, tell outrageous lies, and blow up the heads of so-called “friends.”

Four Game Modes in Early Access!

  • Each player has a deck of number and special cards.

  • Players take turns adding to a shared total without going over the target.

  • Special cards can be used to trick opponents.

  • If a player goes over, their head inflates. If they survive, they stay. If not, they're out.

  • Each round, a card is selected for the table, and players must take turns placing matching cards face-down.

  • Lying is allowed. If someone suspects a bluff, they can call “beeble meep.”

  • If it’s a bluff, the liar inflates their head. Could survive, could explode. If not a bluff, the accuser suffers instead.

  • After any inflation or explosion, a new round begins.

  • Watch for the Deadeye card, it may let the accused shoot another player. Might hit, might backfire.

  • Each player starts with 3 cards.

  • Play a card equal to or higher than the one on the table. Same-number cards can be played together.

  • Draw a new card for each one you play. Always keep 3 in hand.

  • Don’t have any cards to play? Your head inflates.

  • Special cards can change everything. Use them smart or chaotic.

  • Play smart. Keep your skull safe.

  • At the start of each round, one player becomes the VORP.

  • A topic and secret word are chosen. Everyone sees the word except the VORP.

  • Players write clues. The VORP fakes a clue and tries to guess the word.

  • Then, players discuss and vote on who they think the VORP is.

  • If the real VORP is caught, they must guess the word. Fail, and they lose a life.

  • Lose all lives, and you're off to meet your alien god.

See You In The Game!

Take your seat in Bogos Binted? right now and dive into chaotic fun with the galaxy’s most disposable, big-eyed companions. Just remember: no one here tells you to “play fair.”

They’re aliens. They don’t even speak English.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or may be inappropriate to view in a workplace setting.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / Ryzen 3 2200G
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 1030 / Radeon RX 550
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 800 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows® 11 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 2600
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX1060 / Radeon RX 580
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 800 MB available space

item.title: Terraformental
item.description:
Title: Terraformental
Genre: Adventure , Indie , Early Access
Developer: Shady Games
Publisher: Shady Games
Release Date: Jan 28, 2026
Early Access Release Date: Jan 28, 2026




About This Game

Narrative-Driven Incremental Adventure

After waking up alone with no memories in a derelict terraforming facility on an unknown (and distinctly not terraformed) planet, it's up to you to find a way to survive, learn what happened to the people who lived here and why you were abandoned.

As you follow the trail of the colonists who fled the facility, you quickly find yourself caught in a time loop, resetting you to the same moment you first woke up each time you die. The ability to learn from even your most fatal mistakes will certainly come in handy, allowing you to become faster and more efficient over time, but it does have its limits. No matter how much you optimise your routes and actions, your body can only become so much stronger or faster. Eventually you'll have to find smarter ways to solve the problems you face instead.

Resource Management

You'll need reliable ways to find air, water and food if you plan to survive for very long. But you can't carry all of it with you all the time, so prioritizing what resources you use and when can help you get that little bit farther. The best priorities can vary depending on where you're going, so it always pays to be adaptable.

Meta Progression

Each time you complete an action, you'll be faster on the next loop - to a point. Completing sets of actions enough times groups them together into a combined action, further increasing the speed and efficiency of them. But these won't be enough for you to solve all the mysteries of the planet on their own.

Non-Linear Exploration

Numerous terraforming facilities are spread across the planet, each containing unique challenges and opportunities. Once you learn where they are and how to get there, you're free to visit them in any order you wish. Tired or frustrated with the puzzle you've been working on? Maybe another facility holds the key to simplifying it.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64 bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i3 (2.0 GHz) or equivalent
    • Memory: 512 MB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 512 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2.5 GHz) or equivalent
    • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 512 MB available space

item.title: Dark Auction
item.description:
Title: Dark Auction
Genre: Adventure
Developer: IzanagiGames
Publisher: IzanagiGames , GOOD SMILE COMPANY
Franchise: IzanagiGames
Release Date: Jan 28, 2026




About This Game

A brand-new mystery adventure game, with both story and script written by Rika Suzuki, known for her brilliant work on Another Code/Trace Memory and Hotel Dusk: Room 215 . It also features character design by Kohske, author/illustrator of GANGSTA. , and music by Monster Hunter composer, Yuko Komiyama, and Tsukasa Masuko, composer for the Megami Tensei series. Directed and produced by Shinsuke Umeda (IzanagiGames).

Game features:

- Explore freely within an old castle rendered in 3D

- Use reasoning and deduction to solve clues via the Word Cloud System

- Use memories to expose the truth via each Auction

In the exploration phase, you will search rooms and floors, and talk to other participants, revealing trauma and lies that will lead you to the truth each one keeps hidden.

Information you learn here will be stored in your Word Cloud, and can then be used to solve mysteries during each auction!

But in this place, the auction exhibits aren't bid on with money, but with memories.

Auction participants try to win their bids by offering their own memories, using a memory reconstruction device known as EPO.

But memories burdened by secrets or trauma can change completely, becoming distorted and incorrect.

If the participants offer incomplete memories, their auction bids will fail.

Noah must become their supporter, fixing each target's memory to ensure they are correct.

If the auction is a success, the truth will be revealed—unleashing the dramatic story behind each ill-fated auction exhibit.

Story:

1981, Somewhere in Europe.

Eighteen-year-old Noah is haunted by the memory of his mother abandoning him as a child.

He lives with his father Leonard, a failed writer obsessed with collecting items related to “Dictator X.”

Noah wishes he would stop, but Leonard refuses to give up his strange obsession, even as they struggle financially.

One day, an auction invitation arrives, addressed to Leonard. Ignoring Noah’s protests, Leonard sets off for the old castle where the auction is to be held, promising to tell Noah everything once he returns.

But Leonard never comes home. With no way to contact him, Noah heads to the castle himself, determined to bring him home—only to witness something shocking.

Trapped inside the castle with the other guests, Noah decided to accept the Auctioneer's invitation, and take part in the auction himself.

Characters:

Noah Crawford (VA. Kengo Kawanishi)

Leonard Crawford (VA. Rikiya Koyama)

Edgar Schultz (VA. Daisuke Namikawa)

Christoph Treheim von Berg (VA. Nobunaga Shimazaki)

Otto Klein (VA. Shunsuke Takeuchi)

Karla Becker (VA. Maaya Uchida)

Lorraine Klopp (VA. Yui Ishikawa)

Hell (VA. Akira Ishida)

Auctioneer (VA. Show Hayami)

Game Overview:

Title: Dark Auction

Genre: Mystery Adventure

Development / Marketing: IzanagiGames

Story / Script: Rika Suzuki (Another Code/Trace Memory and Hotel Dusk: Room 215)

Character Design: Kohske (GANGSTA.)

Music: Yuko Komiyama (Monster Hunter series), Tsukasa Masuko (Megami Tensei series)

Director / Producer: Shinsuke Umeda (IzanagiGames)

Copyright: © IzanagiGames, Inc. / GOOD SMILE COMPANY

* This game is a story about young people learning about the past, and striving to protect a peaceful future. Although memories related to past wars feature in this game, it does not in any way, seek to glorify or promote the crimes of war.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel® Core i5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 11 or later
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 8 GB available space

item.title: HELLMART
item.description:
Title: HELLMART
Genre: Adventure , Indie , Simulation
Developer: GAZE IN GAMES
Publisher: GAZE IN GAMES
Release Date: Jan 28, 2026




About This Game

You came up north chasing easy money - and to get away from people.

A quiet town. A tiny store. Barely any customers. What could possibly go wrong?

Step into the shoes of a regular night shift manager and try to stay alive in this strange place.

Your actions matter: the fate of your customers and the story's ending depend on the decisions you make throughout the game.

DAYTIME — ALMOST A NORMAL STORE

- Hit your daily sales quota

- Restock shelves

- Keep the store and surrounding area clean

- Work the register

- DON’T BE RUDE TO CUSTOMERS

IN THE EVENING — evil awakens. Get ready for its visit:

- Watch the generator

- Barricade the doors

- Check the security cams

- Buy supplies

- Upgrade the store to survive

- DON'T LET EVIL GET IN

AT NIGHT

The Nightmare Begins.

- Interact with late-night customers

- Evil will try to trick you

- Decide who to let in and who to leave to their fate

- Your life depends on your actions

- DON'T STEP OUTSIDE

KEY FEATURES

- A blend of supermarket simulator and horror, where everyday routine gradually turns into a nightmare

- Dynamic customer behavior and horror systems that adapt to how you play. No two shifts are ever the same

- Realistic visuals that capture the eerie vibe of a roadside store surrounded by snowy woods

- Evil that stalks the nights, able to mimic any customer

- Your actions matter: the fate of your customers and the story's ending depend on the decisions you make throughout the game

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains a scene of masturbation and depictions of tobacco and alcohol use, including the buying and selling of tobacco and alcohol products.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Integrated
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel core Core i5-8600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia RTX3060 or AMD RX 6600 XT
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Integrated
